desc: Burstable performance instances offering baseline CPU performance with the ability to burst above the baseline.

AMD-based burstable instances that offer a cost-effective option for variable workloads.
Burstable instances powered by AWS Graviton2 processors for improved price/performance.

Temporary visitor visa for business-related travel.
Temporary visitor visa for tourism, vacation, or medical treatment.
Visa for academic students pursuing full-time studies in the U.S.
Dependent visa for immediate family members of F-1 students.
Visa for vocational or non-academic students enrolled in technical or vocational programs.
Dependent visa for immediate family members of M-1 students.
Exchange visitor visa for individuals participating in approved exchange programs.
Dependent visa for immediate family members of J-1 exchange visitors.
Visa for specialty occupation workers requiring specialized knowledge and a bachelor's degree or higher.
Visa for temporary agricultural workers coming to the U.S. for seasonal work.
Visa for temporary non-agricultural workers filling seasonal or intermittent jobs.
Visa for trainees or participants in special education or training programs not available in the applicant's home country.
Visa for intracompany transferees in managerial positions or with specialized knowledge moving within a company.
Dependent visa for immediate family members of L-1 visa holders.
Visa for individuals with extraordinary ability or achievement in the sciences, arts, education, business, or athletics.
Visa for individuals accompanying and assisting O-1 visa holders in their specific events or performances.
Dependent visa for immediate family members of O-1 visa holders.
Visa for internationally recognized athletes or entertainers.
Visa for artists or entertainers participating in a reciprocal exchange program.
Visa for artists or entertainers performing under a culturally unique program.
Visa for participants in an international cultural exchange program.
Visa for religious workers coming to the U.S. to work for a nonprofit religious organization.
Fiancé(e) visa for foreign-citizen fiancé(e)s of U.S. citizens, allowing entry to the U.S. to marry within 90 days.
Dependent visa for children of K-1 visa holders.
Visa for the foreign-citizen spouse of a U.S. citizen to help shorten the family separation during the immigration process.
Dependent visa for children of K-3 visa holders.
Visa for Canadian and Mexican professionals under the USMCA (formerly NAFTA), allowing them to work in specific professional occupations.
Diversity Visa granted through the Diversity Visa Lottery program for immigrants from underrepresented countries.
Immigrant visa for spouses of U.S. citizens.
Immigrant visa for unmarried children under 21 of U.S. citizens.
Immigrant visa for orphans adopted abroad by U.S. citizens.
Immigrant visa for orphans to be adopted in the U.S. by U.S. citizens.
Alternate designation for an immigrant visa for spouses of U.S. citizens.
Employment-based immigrant visa for individuals with extraordinary ability, outstanding professors, or multinational executives.
Employment-based immigrant visa for professionals holding advanced degrees or those with exceptional ability.
Employment-based immigrant visa for skilled workers, professionals, and other workers.
Employment-based immigrant visa for special immigrants, including religious workers and other select groups.
Employment-based immigrant visa for investors who invest in a U.S. business that creates jobs.
